TaskDefinition.name: Setup Demo

entry.value: Load the Plugin Deployer,Aggregate HR Authoritative, Aggregate AD Accounts, Aggregate Enterprise Directory Accounts, Aggregate Oracle EBS Accounts, Aggregate Mainframe Accounts, Aggregate ERP Portal Accounts, Aggregate PRISM, Aggregate TRAKK, Aggregate TRAKK-WS, Aggregate AD Groups, Aggregate Enterprise Directory Groups, Aggregate PRISM Groups, Aggregate Oracle EBS Roles and Responsibilities, Aggregate Mainframe Groups, Aggregate Windows FileServer Access, Aggregate TRAKK-WS Groups, Import Demo User Responses, Import Demo Roles, Task - Import SOD Policies, FAM Classification Task, Identity Refresh - Remove Joiner Event, Configure RapidSetup Users, Task - Setup Bots, Setup PAM, Refresh Entitlement Connections, Refresh Groups, Detect Policy Violations, SERI - Demo Certification Setup, SERI - Demo Trending Setup, Refresh Monitored Users Risk Scores, Create Dropdown Rules, SERI - Demo Request Setup, SERI - Demo Dashboard Setup, SERI - Demo Certification Signoff Setup, Refresh Application Scores, KPI Plugin - Run all tasks, Task - Enable RapidSetup Joiner, Task - Dynamic Approval Setup, Initial Refresh for Demo Users, Perform Maintenance

TaskDefinition.Description: Run the tasks needed to setup the SERI standard demo
